SEARCH:
Package com.icx.dom.domain.sql

Klasse SqlRegistry

java.lang.Object
com.icx.common.base.Common
com.icx.common.Reflection
com.icx.dom.domain.Registry<SqlDomainObject>
com.icx.dom.domain.sql.SqlRegistry
public class SqlRegistry extends Registry<SqlDomainObject>
Singleton to register Java class/SQL table and field/column associations. Based on domain class registration of Registry. Only used internally.

  • Verschachtelte Klassen - Übersicht
